DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient Class

In this Article

Edit

Creates a Data Lake Store filesystem management client.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient : ServiceClient<DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient>, IDataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient, IDisposable, IAzureClient, ServiceClient<DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient>Public Class DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient
